snippet.title: Save the Villainess: Steam Game Trailer
snippet.description:
If you became a villainess in a romance story you cannot remember… what would you do if someone wanted to murder you?

Find out in Save the Villainess, our upcoming otome isekai roleplaying game - now available to wishlist on Steam!

🦋Support Us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/565568843/save-the-villainess-an-otome-isekai-roleplaying-game

🦋Download Windows Demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2578180/Save_the_Villainess_An_Otome_Isekai_Roleplaying_Game/

🦋Download Windows/Mac Demo on Itch.io: https://bestlaidplansproductions.itch.io/save-the-villainess

#villainess  #otome  #otomegame  #isekai  #videogametrailers  #visualnovel  #interactivefiction  #historical  #romance  #romancegame 

Credits: Trailer edited by @Sokei 

Theme Song Composition and Lyrics by @JunbugP 

Theme Song Vocals by @SakiRose 

Characters by Somate Studio.

Item Art by Saleha Chowdhury. 

Backgrounds by Saleha Chowdhury, Somate Studio, Fuura_Xen, Karel Kok, Son Huynh, Maciej Ptasinski

**Song Lyrics**

Fly butterfly, from my grasp you escape me
Sing me your lies, tempt me with your enchanting dance

Back and forth we rock on, the pendulum swinging
Behind my eyes it moves me, the pain still lingering
Do I trust you or myself, is no one left to help
And yet back and forth we swing to rhythm we can’t perceive

Fly butterfly, in the dark you feel light
Show me the way you escape my embrace
Hiiiiiiiiiigh

Fly butterfly, from my grasp you escape me
Sing me your lies, tempt me with your enchanting death

Back and forth we sway to rhythms we can’t perceive...
